Public Member Functions

NT_timing_o Class Reference

NT_timing_o a stopwatch like measurement object: void start() : start timing double stop() : stop timing void reset() : set elapsed time to 0.0 double read() : read elapsed time (in seconds).

#include <nt_timing_obj.h>
